metadata.title: CVE-2017-7609 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
elf_compress.c in elfutils 0.168 does not validate the zlib compressionfactor, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption) via a crafted ELF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7609` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
libasm1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
libdw1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
libelf1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.158-0ubuntu5.2').
